item.content:encoded:
If you’re in search of the perfect themes and templates to elevate your farming services website, this list of the top WordPress theme/templates options can help you select the most suitable one.

If you’re seeking a clean, modern, and retina-ready design for your farming website, this theme/template is the perfect option. It’s versatile and suitable for a variety of farming-related services, and incorporating this business theme can significantly boost your company’s online visibility.

Please develop a website using the Farming Service Website theme for your personal use.

To access more detailed information are provided below:

  1. Gardenko – Gardening & Landscaping WordPress Theme

A Premium WordPress theme suitable for all types of farming services-related websites.

With a clean and modern design, this theme is user-friendly and easy to navigate. It is specifically crafted to highlight your farming services and products effectively.

The theme comes with support for various plugins, such as Elementor Page Builder, Contact Form 7 Plugin, Slider Revolution Plugin, and more, all built on HTML5 & CSS3, Event Calendar Plugin.

Buy Now

2.  Aqovo – Aqua Farm & Fishery Services HTML Template

This HTML template is exceptional and is designed specifically for aquaculture.

This Template Provides Unique Website Demos, Unique Header and Footer, Awesome Inner Page, Responsive and Retina Ready, SEO Friendly, 24*7 Customer Support, Well Documented, Advanced UI/UX Design, Regular Update, Built on HTML5 & CSS3.

A versatile HTML template that offers a range of features and services related to agriculture, dairy farming, and gardening to cater to the needs of its users.

The template includes pre-built sections and pages for an online store, allowing users to sell agricultural products such as seeds, fertilizers, and dairy products directly from their website.

Get WordPress Version

Buy Now

3. Agrotek | Agriculture, Dairy farm and Gardening HTML Template

Featuring a responsive, modern, and clean design, this template empowers you to create a unique website for a variety of agricultural and farming-related services such as gardening, dairy farming, organic stores, poultry, landscaping, and more.

Services: Offering gardening services, Online Store, Dairy Farm Services

A comprehensive HTML template that provides an array of services related to agriculture, dairy farming, and gardening to cater to the needs of its users.

Buy Now

Get WordPress Version Here!

For A Live Preview

4. Rosewood | Eco Organic Farming Agricultural WordPress Theme

This is an Organic Farming WordPress Theme that has a modern and appealing design, and is responsive to different devices. The theme is suitable for people who are involved in farming and want to sell organic farm products online. It offers a range of customizable features, making it a great choice for those who manufacture eco-friendly products and have an online store or a food shop that sells organic products promoting healthy living.

Get The Free Life Time Update, User Friendly Page builder, SEO Friendly, Multi Language Support, One Click Demo Installation, Easy Automatic Update, Revolution Slider, Contact Form 7 and lot more.

Buy Now

For A Live Preview

5. Farm Agrico | Agricultural Business & Organic Food WordPress Theme

This Organic Food WordPress Theme features vibrant colors and is designed for websites related to natural foods. It is well-suited for businesses in the agricultural industry, as well as for healthy food blogs, gastro-tourism websites, and healthy food shops. It is also an excellent choice for dairy and cheese farms, wineries, grape farms, eco-products stores, fresh bread and bakery stores.

WordPress Theme made with Wpbakery Page Builder Woo commerce, Revolution Slider, Drag and Drop Page Builder, Easy to Customize and lot more.

Buy Now

6. Dairy Farm & Eco Products HTML Template

This HTML template is both responsive and fully Retina-ready, and it is designed for websites related to farming, food markets, eco-products stores, agricultural businesses, healthy food blogs, gastro-tourism websites, and healthy food shops. It is also an excellent choice for dairy and cheese farms, wineries, grape farms, eco-products stores, fresh bread and bakery stores.

The Great Features are Valid HTML5/CSS3, Full customization, Optimization for search engines, Ultra responsive layout, and Retina Display, 24*7 Customer Support.

Live Preview

Buy Now

item.title: Why React Native Application Is Better Than Native Application?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: What is React?React is a JavaScript library created by Facebook. React is a tool for building UI components. How does React work? React creates a VIRTUAL DOM in memory.Instead of manipulating the browser’s DOM directly, React creates a virtual DOM in memory, where it does all the necessary manipulating, before making the changes in the … Continue reading Why React Native Application Is Better Than Native Application?
item.content:encoded:
What is React?
React is a JavaScript library created by Facebook. React is a tool for building UI components.

How does React work?
React creates a VIRTUAL DOM in memory.
Instead of manipulating the browser’s DOM directly, React creates a virtual DOM in memory, where it does all the necessary manipulating, before making the changes in the browser DOM.

5 Reasons Why Is React Native Most Preferred App Development Framework
1. Cross-Platform Compatibility
-> It can be used to develop both Android and iOS apps through one codebase.  It is convenient to embed native codes when the developer has to integrate platform-specific authenticity into your application.

2. UI and Performance
-> Widely used methods for writing hybrid mobile applications are combinations of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The applications will maintain high performance without sacrificing capability as React works independently from the UI.

3. Live Update & Codepush
->  The users won’t have to go through the entire app store update cycle again and again to update your app. You can easily integrate Microsoft’s live update service CodePush SDK to your React Native app.

4. Scope To Use Native Code
-> React Native efficiently merges native components inscribed in Objective-C, Java, or Swift. Developing customized native components and binding them together for each supported platform in a React Component gives a performance boost.

5. Hot Reloading
-> React Native boosts productivity and reduces overall development time with the introduction of Hot Reload. It enables a developer to keep the app running while implementing new versions and tweaking the UI. 

5 basic insights as to why React Native has been so successful.

  1. A framework for writing real, natively rendering mobile applications for iOS, Android, and Windows platform.
  2. Uses a bridge to translate all JavaScript code to the target device’s native language (Java on Android and Objective-C on iOS).
  3. Uses the same standard UI building blocks as regular iOS and Android apps.
  4. Enables fast and efficient mobility solutions with unified development teams for both web and mobile apps.
  5. Used to build popular apps such as Facebook, Instagram, Skype, Airbnb, Walmart, Tesla, and many more.

Check Our Very First Development Of React Template Here Or Else You Can Buy Here!

item.title: The Most Known Rules About WordPress Logo & Trademark
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: WordPress is one of the Open-source Softwares, that can is not only provided for study but easily modifiable & one can easily redistribute its source code. Let’s check out deep into WordPress Logo & Trademark. WordPress is still protected by under the General Public License (GPL) Certificate. This makes freedom to use it but not … Continue reading The Most Known Rules About WordPress Logo & Trademark
item.content:encoded:
WordPress is one of the Open-source Softwares, that can is not only provided for study but easily modifiable & one can easily redistribute its source code. Let’s check out deep into WordPress Logo & Trademark.

WordPress is still protected by under the General Public License (GPL) Certificate. This makes freedom to use it but not you can not own rights.                               

Understand WordPress Logo & Trademark Rules,

WordPress holds 35% shares of all the websites on the internet. Around the globe, a huge number of communities rely on WordPress for their businesses.

To ensure that everything works smoothly, WordPress brand and trademark should have been secured. For this reason, the WordPress trademark moved to The WordPress Foundation in 2010

Each should pursue to utilize the WordPress trademark and logo in your ventures appropriately.

There are as under you must know.

(1) Try not to use WordPress in Domain Name

 Just like other trademarks, WordPress Foundation holds the exclusive usage rights for the term “WordPress”.

For Example :

  •  www.ttmWordPress.in     
  • Instead, use www.ttmwp.in 

(2) Write WordPress with a Capital

The correct way to spell WordPress is with a capital P. The WordPress community is very concerned about this capitalization.

If You are using “WordPress” anywhere then make sure you use the correct spelling.

The WordPress development team introduced a script into the core of WordPress 3.0 that forces a lowercase p to upper in the trademarked name, WordPress.

(3) The WordPress Logo

  You may have seen the WordPress logo consists of the letter W in a grey or sometimes white circle with a grey ring around it.

The ideal logo is the height of the letter W is exquisite.
For the commercial purpose, you can download logos & graphics from https://wordpress.org/about/logos/

(4) No Affiliation or Endorsement

You are strictly not allowed to use it in a way that suggests endorsement or affiliation with your project. It could be,

  • You can place ‘Powered by WordPress.org’ on your website, but you cannot say ‘Recommended by WordPress’.
  • You cannot use the WordPress logo in your product’s advertisements.
  • You cannot use WordPress or its logo as part of your own logo.

What Cost For Violations?

  •  The WordPress foundation takes these violations very seriously.
  • You may receive an email or legal notice from their lawyers to comply with their trademark guidelines. These actions may include several legal procedures and would cost you a lot of money.

item.title: The Best 5 WordPress Spinning Wheel Popup Plugins to Boost Conversions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Spinning wheel popup plugin gets users excited to spin the wheel to win something. It’s obviously a great way to increase conversions on your website. A spinning wheel plugin gets users excited to spin the wheel to win something. It’s obviously a great way to increase conversions on your website.  You can find several free … Continue reading The Best 5 WordPress Spinning Wheel Popup Plugins to Boost Conversions
item.content:encoded:
Spinning wheel popup plugin gets users excited to spin the wheel to win something. It’s obviously a great way to increase conversions on your website.

A spinning wheel plugin gets users excited to spin the wheel to win something. It’s obviously a great way to increase conversions on your website. 

You can find several free and paid WordPress spinning wheel plugins available that permit clients to turn the wheel to win prizes! 

You can additionally add these plugins to our themes & templates. Click here to get exclusive themes.

Here are some key features that you’ll often see in a WordPress spinning wheel popup plugin:

  • Ability to add prizes to each slice
  • Color, size, and slice customization
  • Integration with email marketing services.
  • General Data Protection Regulation for data collection
  • Automatic coupon generation system
  • Get insights into how users are using the spinning wheel

We have a list of the best “spin to win” plugins, as follows.

1. OptinMonster

OptiMonster is the most powerful software for lead generation and conversion optimization. It boost users’ interaction, it lets you create a gamified coupon wheel optin form. It has several fully customized features available with pro version too.

The spinning wheel popup lets you offer great prizes to your users. It engages the audience by making them play the spinning wheel game in order to earn rewards.

The best part is that OptinMonster provides out of the box integration with popular email marketing services, like Constant Contact, MailChimp, AWeber, and more.

2. Lucky wheel For WooCommerce

Lucky Wheel for WooCommerce offers visitors entering their email address to spin the lucky wheel and win rewards.

Some of the amazing features of this plugin are:

  • Limit the spinning times for each user
  • 6 different popup positions to choose from
  • Configure the winning probability of each section of the wheel in percentages
  • Send coupon code to the winners via email

3. Discount Win-Wheel For WooCommerce

It is a premium and mobile-friendly plugin. It’ll help you to boost the engagement of your site visitors by providing them several schemes to increase the sales of your product

The Discount Win-Wheel for WooCommerce plugin also comes with useful features like:

  • Offers multiple triggers like on page load, on icon click, and on exit.
  • Set up the popup display timing easily
  • Ability to add the popup wheel on multiple locations
  • Compatible with the WPML plugin

4. Wheel of Pop-Ups

Wheel of Popups is an eCommerce friendly spinning wheel popup plugin. It is compatible to work with all platforms, including WooCommerce, Shopify, Magento, etc. To drive more traffic and user engagement, you can use this plugin on your WordPress site too. The plugin offers a discount wheel popup template where you can customize colors, fonts, text, and prizes. It has several marketing tools to promote your campaigns.

5. WP Optin Wheel

WP Optin Wheel is a freemium gamification plugin for WordPress and WooCommerce. You can even create multiple wheels for different campaigns without much hassle. Also, you can control when you want to show the popup to your visitors. You can even create multiple wheels for different campaigns without much hassle. Also, you can control when you want to show the popup to your visitors. WP Optin Wheel is a GDPR-ready plugin, to get consent from your website visitors before collecting their information.
